sources.styles/core/variables.sass:
@font-face
  font-family: "Avenir-Black"
  font-weight: normal
  font-style: normal

  src: url("../fonts/Avenir-Black.woff") format("woff"),
  src: url("../fonts/Avenir-Black.woff2") format("woff")

@font-face
  font-family: "Avenir-Medium"
  font-weight: normal
  font-style: normal

  src: url("../fonts/Avenir-Medium.woff") format("woff"),
  src: url("../fonts/Avenir-Medium.woff2") format("woff")

@font-face
  font-family: "Avenir-Roman"
  font-weight: normal
  font-style: normal

  src: url("../fonts/Avenir-Roman.woff") format("woff"),
  src: url("../fonts/Avenir-Roman.woff2") format("woff")

// Color
$color-main: #9AA3B0
$color-main--light: lighten($color-main, 10%)
$color-main--dark: darken($color-main, 10%)
$color-grey: #9AA3B0

$color-selection: $color-main
$scrollbar-color: $color-main

$color-header: #08153A
$color-body: #08153A
$color-border: rgba(182, 182, 182, 0.4)

// Type
$font-header: "Avenir-black", Arial, Sans-Serif
$font-body: "Avenir-Roman", Arial, Sans-Serif

// Animation
$transition1: 0.28s all ease
sources.styles/core/globals.sass:
*
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box
  box-sizing: border-box

html
  font-size: 62.5%

  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale

body
  margin: 0

  background: rgb(255,255,255)
  background: linear-gradient(190deg, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%, rgba(245,245,245,1) 100%)

::selection
  color: #fff
  background: $color-selection

::-webkit-scrollbar
  width: 5px

  background: #f6f6f6

::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb
  background-color: $scrollbar-color

// img reset
img
  max-width: 100%
  height: auto

// basic hr
hr,
.hr
  display: block

  height: 0.1rem
  margin: 0
  padding: 0

  border: 0
  background: $color-border

// wrapper
.wrapper
  max-width: 1000px
  margin: 0 auto
  padding: 30px

figure
  margin: 0

.mannenman
  height: 800px

.logo
  display: block

  height: 30px
  margin-bottom: 10px

body
  overflow: hidden

  max-width: 100vw
  max-height: 100vh

main
  display: flex
  align-items: center
  justify-content: center

  width: 100vw
  height: 100vh

.btn
  display: block

  padding: 11px 18px

  cursor: pointer
  transition: .3s ease all
  letter-spacing: 0.5px
  text-transform: uppercase

  color: rgba(#08153A, 0.9)
  border: none
  background: #D8DFEB

  font-family: "Avenir-Medium", Arial, Sans-Serif

  &:hover
    transform: scale(1.1)

.content

  h3
    margin-top: 2rem

  h1
    width: 280px

.actions
  display: flex

.action
  transition: .3s all ease

  opacity: .3

  &:hover
    cursor: pointer

    opacity: 1

  &:last-child
    margin-right: 0

.action--active
  opacity: .8

.capture-pose
  position: fixed

.view
  margin-top: 420px

.pose-select
  display: flex

  margin-left: 100px

  transform: translateY(100%) scaleX(0.9)

  .row
    display: flex
    align-items: center
    flex-direction: column

  img
    height: 180px
    margin: 20px

    cursor: pointer
    transition: .3s all ease

#shadow
  position: fixed
  z-index: -1
  top: 80%
  left: 50%

  width: 248px
  height: 70px

  opacity: .14
  border-radius: 50%
  background: #08153A

  filter: blur(14px)

.content-section-container
  position: relative

  overflow: hidden

  height: 200px

.content-section
  position: absolute

  visibility: hidden

  transform: translateY(-30px)

  opacity: 0

  &:first-of-type
    visibility: visible

    transform: none

    opacity: 1

.content-section--time
  h4
    display: block

    margin: 0
    margin-right: 10px

    font-family: "Avenir-Roman"
    font-size: 3.1rem

  small
    font-family: "Avenir-Medium"
    font-size: 1.2rem

  img
    height: 2rem

.time-selector
  display: flex
  align-items: flex-end

  margin-bottom: 2rem

.content-section--active
  display: block

.mannenman-small
  height: 120px

.small-man-wrapper
  display: flex
  align-items: center

  margin-top: -5px
  margin-bottom: 15px
  margin-left: -30px

.sequence
  margin-left: 80px

  h4
    color: #9AA3B0

    font-size: 1.8rem

    small
      font-family: "Avenir-Roman"

.sequence__container
  width: 650px
  max-width: 100%
  height: 240px

  img
    height: 120px

html
  overflow: auto

.action
  display: flex
  align-items: center
  flex-direction: column
  justify-content: center

  margin-right: 20px

  &:last-child
    margin-right: 0

  .action-img
    transition: .1s all ease

    border: grey 1px solid
    border-radius: 50%

  .scale
    transition: .3s all ease

  img
    display: none

    width: 50px
    height: 50px
    padding: 7px

    transition: .3s all ease

    &:first-of-type
      display: block

.content-section h3
  display: block

.btn[disabled]
  cursor: not-allowed

  opacity: .3

  &:hover
    transform: none

.sequence__container
  display: flex
  flex-wrap: wrap

  padding-top: 30px

  div
    position: relative

    margin-bottom: 20px

  span
    position: absolute
    right: 20px

    color: #9AA3B0

    font-size: 11px

.pulse
  animation: pulse 1.5s

  box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(#D8DFEB, .6)

@keyframes pulse
  0%
    transform: scale(.9)

  70%
    transform: scale(1)

    box-shadow: 0 0 0 30px rgba(#D8DFEB, 0)

  100%
    transform: scale(.9)

    box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(#D8DFEB, 0)

.row div
  position: relative

  height: 220px
  margin-right: 50px
  margin-bottom: 20px

  cursor: pointer
  transition: .3s all ease

  &:hover
    cursor: pointer
    transform: scale(1.1)

.row p
  position: absolute
  bottom: -20px
  left: 10px

  opacity: .8

  font-family: "Avenir-black", Arial, Sans-Serif
  font-size: 14px
  // transform: rotate(-90deg)

.pose-select
  // margin-top: 100px

h1
  overflow: hidden

  height: 75px

  span
    display: block

.content #start-timer
  margin-bottom: 0
  margin-left: 5px

  // ################

body
  // position: absolute
  // top: 0
  // left: 0

  // display: flex

  // width: 100%
  // height: 100%
  // margin: 0

  // cursor: none
  // cursor: none

  // background: #010101

// h1
//   font-size: 100px
//   font-weight: 700

// a
//   margin-top: -20px

//   border-bottom: 2px solid #fff

// img
//   width: 500px
//   height: 300px
//   margin-top: 50px

.cursor
  pointer-events: none

  &__circle
    position: fixed
    z-index: 10
    top: 0
    left: 0

    transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%)

    mix-blend-mode: difference
    &--big
      transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%)

      stroke: #08153A
      fill: transparent
      mix-blend-mode: difference

    &--small
      transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%)

      fill: #08153A
      mix-blend-mode: difference

  &__plus
    position: fixed
    z-index: 100
    top: 0
    left: 0

    transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%)

    stroke: transparent
    fill: transparent
    mix-blend-mode: normal
    &--area
      stroke: transparent
sources.styles/core/type.sass:
body
  color: $color-body

  font-family: $font-body
  font-size: 1.58rem
  font-weight: 400
  line-height: 1.6

h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6,
th
  display: inline-block

  margin: 0 0 0.3em 0

  color: #08153A

  font-family: $font-header
  font-weight: 400
  line-height: 1.18

h1,
.h1
  font-size: 3.16rem

h2,
.h2
  font-size: 4.8rem

h3,
.h3
  color: $color-grey

  font-family: "Avenir-Roman", Arial, Sans-Serif
  font-size: 1.83rem

h4,
.h4
  font-size: 2.7rem

h5,
.h5
  font-size: 2.2rem

h6,
.h6
  font-size: 2rem

p,
.p
  max-width: 750px
  margin: 0 0 1em 0

  &:last-child
    margin-bottom: 0

a
  transition: $transition1
  text-decoration: none

  color: initial
